input_args.passage: "Wong Jing | Wong Yat-cheong, better known by his stage name as Wong Jing or Barry Wong, is a Hong Kong film director, producer, actor, presenter, and screenwriter.\nJing Wong | Jing Wong. Producer: Hak bak jin cheung. Wong Jing is one of Hong Kong's most prolific, talented and controversial filmmakers."
input_args.claim: 'From both sources and, we can deduce that Wong Jing, also known by the stage name Barry Wong, is a Hong Kong film director, producer, actor, presenter, and screenwriter.'
